column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This place is a great spot for a casual outing with friends or for a date. They have a great selection of drinks and tapas
column2: and what's best is that the menu has certain popular items highlighted for you in case you're indecisive. We tried the hangar steak
column5: along with the caramelized bananas for dessert. I had a classic red sangria
column6: which was great/decently strong. I recommend you get all of these! Very delicious
column7: a great atmosphere and friendly service.
